verses.verse: <S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%>
<S%H1835>Dan,<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> and <S%H836>Asher.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> [were] <S%H6147>Er,<s%> <S%H209>Onan,<s%> and <S%H7956>Shelah;<s%> [these] <S%H7969>three<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> to him by Bath-shua the <S%H3669>Canaanitess.<s%> And <S%H6147>Er,<s%> Judah's first-born, was <S%H7451>wicked<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> so He <S%H4191>put<s%> him to <S%H4191>death.<s%>
And <S%H8559>Tamar<s%> his daughter-in-law <S%H3205>bore<s%> him <S%H6557>Perez<s%> and <S%H2226>Zerah.<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> had <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> in <S%H3605>all.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6557>Perez<s%> [were] <S%H2696>Hezron<s%> and <S%H2538>Hamul.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah<s%> [were] <S%H2174>Zimri,<s%> <S%H387>Ethan,<s%> <S%H1968>Heman,<s%> <S%H3633>Calcol,<s%> and <S%H1873>Dara;<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> of them in <S%H3605>all.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3756>Carmi<s%> [was] <S%H5917>Achar,<s%> the <S%H5916>troubler<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H4603>violated<s%> the <S%H9172>ban.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H387>Ethan<s%> [was] <S%H5838>Azariah.<s%>
Now the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2696>Hezron,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> to him [were] <S%H3396>Jerahmeel,<s%> <S%H7410>Ram,<s%> and <S%H3621>Chelubai.<s%>

And <S%H7410>Ram<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5992>Amminadab,<s%> and <S%H5992>Amminadab<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5177>Nahshon,<s%> <S%H5387>leader<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%>
<S%H5177>Nahshon<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H8007>Salma,<s%> <S%H8007>Salma<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H1162>Boaz,<s%>
<S%H1162>Boaz<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5744>Obed,<s%> and <S%H5744>Obed<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse;<s%>
and <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H446>Eliab<s%> his first-born, then <S%H41>Abinadab<s%> the <S%H8145>second,<s%> <S%H8092>Shimea<s%> the <S%H7992>third,<s%>
<S%H5417>Nethanel<s%> the <S%H7243>fourth,<s%> <S%H7288>Raddai<s%> the <S%H2549>fifth,<s%>
<S%H684>Ozem<s%> the <S%H8345>sixth,<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh;<s%>

and their <S%H269>sisters<s%> [were] <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%> and <S%H26>Abigail.<s%> And the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%> [were] <S%H52>Abshai,<s%> <S%H3097>Joab,<s%> and <S%H6214>Asahel.<s%>
And <S%H26>Abigail<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H6021>Amasa,<s%> and the father of <S%H1>Amasa<s%> was <S%H6021>Jether<s%> the <S%H3500>Ishmaelite.<s%>

Now <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2696>Hezron<s%> <S%H3205>had<s%> <S%H3205>sons<s%> by <S%H5806>Azubah<s%> [his] <S%H802>wife,<s%> and by <S%H3408>Jerioth;<s%> and <S%H428>these<s%> were her <S%H1121>sons:<s%> <S%H3475>Jesher,<s%> <S%H7727>Shobab,<s%> and <S%H715>Ardon.<s%>
When <S%H5806>Azubah<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> <S%H3947>married<s%> <S%H672>Ephrath,<s%> who <S%H3205>bore<s%> him <S%H2354>Hur.<s%>
And <S%H2354>Hur<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H221>Uri,<s%> and <S%H221>Uri<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H1212>Bezalel.<s%>

<S%H310>Afterward<s%> <S%H2696>Hezron<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> in to the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the father of <S%H1>Gilead,<s%> whom he <S%H1568>married<s%> when he was <S%H3947>sixty<s%> <S%H8346>years<s%> <S%H8141>old;<s%> and she <S%H1121>bore<s%> him <S%H3205>Segub.<s%>
And <S%H7687>Segub<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H2971>Jair,<s%> who <S%H1961>had<s%> twenty-three <S%H5892>cities<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>

But <S%H1650>Geshur<s%> and <S%H758>Aram<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H2333>towns<s%> of <S%H2971>Jair<s%> from them, with <S%H7079>Kenath<s%> and its <S%H1323>villages,<s%> [even] <S%H8346>sixty<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir,<s%> the father of <S%H1>Gilead.<s%>

And <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of <S%H2696>Hezron<s%> in Caleb-ephrathah, <S%H29>Abijah,<s%> Hezron's <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> him <S%H806>Ashhur<s%> the father of <S%H1>Tekoa.<s%>

Now the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3396>Jerahmeel<s%> the first-born of <S%H2696>Hezron<s%> [were] <S%H7410>Ram<s%> the first-born, then <S%H946>Bunah,<s%> <S%H767>Oren,<s%> <S%H684>Ozem,<s%> [and] <S%H281>Ahijah.<s%>
And <S%H3396>Jerahmeel<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H802>wife,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H5851>Atarah;<s%> she was the <S%H517>mother<s%> of <S%H208>Onam.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7410>Ram,<s%> the first-born of <S%H3396>Jerahmeel,<s%> were <S%H4619>Maaz,<s%> <S%H3226>Jamin,<s%> and <S%H6134>Eker.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H208>Onam<s%> were <S%H8060>Shammai<s%> and <S%H3047>Jada.<s%> And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8060>Shammai<s%> [were] <S%H5070>Nadab<s%> and <S%H51>Abishur.<s%>
And the <S%H8034>name<s%> of Abishur's <S%H802>wife<s%> [was] <S%H32>Abihail,<s%> and she <S%H3205>bore<s%> him <S%H257>Ahban<s%> and <S%H4140>Molid.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5070>Nadab<s%> [were] <S%H5540>Seled<s%> and <S%H649>Appaim,<s%> and <S%H5540>Seled<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H1121>sons.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H649>Appaim<s%> [was] <S%H3469>Ishi.<s%> And the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3469>Ishi<s%> [was] <S%H8348>Sheshan.<s%> And the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8348>Sheshan<s%> [was] <S%H304>Ahlai.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3047>Jada<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H8060>Shammai<s%> [were] <S%H3500>Jether<s%> and <S%H3083>Jonathan,<s%> and <S%H3500>Jether<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H1121>sons.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> [were] <S%H6431>Peleth<s%> and <S%H2117>Zaza.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3396>Jerahmeel.<s%>

Now <S%H8348>Sheshan<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H3588>only<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H1323>daughters.<s%> And <S%H8348>Sheshan<s%> had an <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%> <S%H5650>servant<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H3398>Jarha.<s%>
And <S%H8348>Sheshan<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> to <S%H3398>Jarha<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%> in <S%H802>marriage,<s%> and she <S%H3205>bore<s%> him <S%H6262>Attai.<s%>
And <S%H6262>Attai<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5416>Nathan,<s%> and <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H2066>Zabad,<s%>
and <S%H2066>Zabad<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H654>Ephlal,<s%> and <S%H654>Ephlal<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5744>Obed,<s%>
and <S%H5744>Obed<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3058>Jehu,<s%> and <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5838>Azariah,<s%>
and <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H2503>Helez,<s%> and <S%H2503>Helez<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H501>Eleasah,<s%>
and <S%H501>Eleasah<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5581>Sismai,<s%> and <S%H5581>Sismai<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H7967>Shallum,<s%>
and <S%H7967>Shallum<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3359>Jekamiah,<s%> and <S%H3359>Jekamiah<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H476>Elishama.<s%>

Now the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3612>Caleb,<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H3396>Jerahmeel,<s%> [were] <S%H4337>Mesha<s%> his first-born, <S%H1931>who<s%> was the father of <S%H1>Ziph;<s%> and his <S%H2128>son<s%> was <S%H1121>Mareshah,<s%> the father of <S%H4762>Hebron.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H9116>Hebron<s%> [were] <S%H7141>Korah<s%> and <S%H9647>Tappuah<s%> and <S%H7552>Rekem<s%> and <S%H8087>Shema.<s%>

And <S%H8087>Shema<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H7357>Raham,<s%> the father of <S%H1>Jorkeam;<s%> and <S%H3421>Rekem<s%> <S%H7552>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3205>Shammai.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8060>Shammai<s%> was <S%H4584>Maon,<s%> and <S%H4584>Maon<s%> [was] the father of <S%H1>Bethzur.<s%>

And <S%H5891>Ephah,<s%> Caleb's <S%H6370>concubine,<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H9173>Haran,<s%> <S%H4162>Moza,<s%> and <S%H1495>Gazez;<s%> and <S%H9173>Haran<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H1495>Gazez.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3056>Jahdai<s%> [were] <S%H7276>Regem,<s%> <S%H3147>Jotham,<s%> <S%H1529>Geshan,<s%> <S%H6404>Pelet,<s%> <S%H5891>Ephah,<s%> and <S%H8174>Shaaph.<s%>
<S%H4601>Maacah,<s%> Caleb's <S%H6370>concubine,<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H7669>Sheber<s%> and <S%H8647>Tirhanah.<s%>

She also <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H8174>Shaaph<s%> the father of <S%H1>Madmannah,<s%> <S%H4089>Sheva<s%> the father of <S%H7724>Machbena<s%> and the father of <S%H1>Gibea;<s%> and the <S%H4343>daughter<s%> of <S%H1>Caleb<s%> [was] <S%H1388>Achsah.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3612>Caleb.<s%> The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2354>Hur,<s%> the first-born of <S%H672>Ephrathah,<s%> [were] <S%H7732>Shobal<s%> the father of Kiriath-jearim,
<S%H8007>Salma<s%> the father of <S%H1>Bethlehem<s%> [and] <S%H1035>Hareph<s%> the father of Beth-gader.
And <S%H7732>Shobal<s%> the father of Kiriath-jearim <S%H1>had<s%> <S%H1961>sons:<s%> <S%H1121>Haroeh,<s%> <S%H7204>half<s%> of the <S%H2677>Manahathites,<s%>

and the <S%H4940>families<s%> of Kiriath-jearim: the <S%H3505>Ithrites,<s%> the <S%H6336>Puthites,<s%> the <S%H8126>Shumathites,<s%> and the <S%H4954>Mishraites;<s%> from <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> the <S%H6882>Zorathites<s%> and the <S%H848>Eshtaolites.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8007>Salma<s%> [were] <S%H1035>Bethlehem<s%> and the <S%H5200>Netophathites,<s%> Atroth-beth-joab and <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H9274>Manahathites,<s%> the <S%H6882>Zorites.<s%>

And the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H9373>scribes<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> at <S%H3258>Jabez<s%> [were] the <S%H8654>Tirathites,<s%> the <S%H8101>Shimeathites,<s%> [and] the <S%H7756>Sucathites.<s%> <S%H1992>Those<s%> are the <S%H7017>Kenites<s%> who <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H9150>Hammath,<s%> the father of the <S%H1>house<s%> of <S%H1004>Rechab.<s%>
